metadata.title: CVE-2020-16119 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel exploitable by a localattacker due to reuse of a DCCP socket with an attached dccps_hc_tx_ccidobject as a listener after being released. Fixed in Ubuntu Linux kernel5.4.0-51.56, 5.3.0-68.63, 4.15.0-121.123, 4.4.0-193.224, 3.13.0.182.191 and3.2.0-149.196.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-121-generic - 4.15.0-121.123
linux-image-4.15.0-121-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-121.123
linux-image-4.15.0-121-lowlatency - 4.15.0-121.123
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-121-generic - 4.15.0-121.123
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-121-lowlatency - 4.15.0-121.123
No subscription required

linux-image-5.3.0-68-generic - 5.3.0-68.63
linux-image-5.3.0-68-lowlatency - 5.3.0-68.63

linux-image-unsigned-5.3.0-68-lowlatency - 5.3.0-68.63
No subscription required
